toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, indicates that the Comp Qty is fixed,and independent of the PO Qty. Example: PO is for 10 and the Fixed Component Qty is set to 5, the Component Order Qty is then set to 5 and the Qty Per is set to .5
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Fixed Component Qty
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__podmd_qtytype_fixedqty_ui__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, indicates that Qty Per is the means that Component Order Qty is/was calculated. Example: If Qty Per is set to 2 and the PO Line is for 10 of the Parent item, then the Component Order Qty is calculated as 20.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Enter Qty Per
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__podmd_qtytype_qtyper_ui__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, indicates that the Quantity for this component is to be entered directly as Component Quantity. In this case, the Qty Per will be calculated automatically.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Enter Component Qty
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__podmd_qtytype_qtyreqd_ui__c
